GalesTressym_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM.synopsis: Player approaches Tara and sees she is carrying an item. Player tries to convince Tara to give the item over. If Gale is in party he will be favoured speaker and will recognize Tara and why she has a magic item with her.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM.synopsis: Player approaches Tara and sees she is carrying an item. Player tries to convince Tara to give the item over. If Gale is in party he will be favoured speaker and will recognize Tara and why she has a magic item with her.

GalesTressym_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_10.speaker: Tara the Tressym
GalesTressym_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_10.text: Mr Dekarios! Heavens, fancy seeing you here!
GalesTressym_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_10.context: NodeContext: Pretending she doesn't speak Common.

GalesTressym_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_21.speaker: Gale
GalesTressym_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_21.text: Have you got any other magic objects you'd be willing to part with?

GalesTressym_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_17.speaker: Tara the Tressym
GalesTressym_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_17.text: I may, or I may not. Depends what you have to offer in return. I have very high standards, mind.

GalesTressym_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_15.speaker: Tara the Tressym
GalesTressym_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_15.text: See you in camp later, hmm?

GalesTressym_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_24.speaker: Tara the Tressym
GalesTressym_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_24.text: That will be all, thank you!

GalesTressym_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_26.speaker: Gale
GalesTressym_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_26.text: She says that will be all.

GalesTressym_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_18.speaker: Gale
GalesTressym_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_18.text: I'd like to know if you have any other interesting objects to trade.

GalesTressym_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_28.speaker: Tara the Tressym
GalesTressym_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_28.text: I've a nose for the things, in fact. But I get bored of déjà vu, so don't expect to see me again.

GalesTressym_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_25.speaker: Tara the Tressym
GalesTressym_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_25.text: Mr Dekarios! Heavens, fancy seeing you here!
GalesTressym_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_25.context: NodeContext: Pretending she doesn't speak Common.

GalesTressym_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_32.speaker: Gale
GalesTressym_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_32.text: Tara! That can't be you, can it?

GalesTressym_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_19.speaker: Gale
GalesTressym_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_19.text: It appears my old friend Tara here has found some objects that might interest us. Care to trade?

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_30.speaker: Gale
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_30.text: Tara, I don't suppose you're responsible for the missing messenger pigeons...

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_47.speaker: Gale
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_47.text: I'd offer you some of your favourite meat, but I haven't got any. Beholder jerky is surprisingly hard to come by.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_55.speaker: Gale
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_55.text: Very well. Enjoy your feast, Tara.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_14.speaker: Tara the Tressym
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_14.text: Mr Dekarios! Heavens, fancy seeing you here!
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_14.context: NodeContext: Pretending she doesn't speak Common.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_77.speaker: Gale
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_77.text: Tara! That can't be you, can it?

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_43.speaker: Tara the Tressym
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_43.text: I suppose you won't be terribly shocked to find your old friend Tara amongst the pigeons. They've always been a personal favourite.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_8.speaker: Gale
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_8.text: My, is that a ring? For us? You shouldn't have.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_63.speaker: Gale
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_63.text: Enjoy yourself now, Tara. Looks like you've got yourself set up quite nicely here.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_58.speaker: Player
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_58.text: What's your tressym doing here, Gale?

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_21.speaker: Gale
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_21.text: She isn't my tressym. She's my friend. And from the looks of things, it appears she's eating pigeons.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_33.speaker: Player
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_33.text: Can you ask her to stop eating pigeons?

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_76.speaker: Player
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_76.text: Hang on - isn't this where the post house's courier pigeons roost? Should she be eating them?

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_20.speaker: Player
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_20.text: Gale, she's been eating those missing courier pigeons. Tell her to stop!

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_78.speaker: Gale
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_78.text: Oh. Right. Did you hear that, Tara? Erm. Stop it.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_0.speaker: Tara the Tressym
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_0.text: Well! These must be important birds indeed, Mr Dekarios. Forgive me for feasting on their bodies and bones so very voraciously.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_29.speaker: Tara the Tressym
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_29.text: Mr Dekarios! Heavens, fancy seeing you here!
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_29.context: NodeContext: Pretending she doesn't speak Common.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_11.speaker: Tara the Tressym
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_11.text: I suppose you won't be terribly shocked to find your old friend Tara amongst the pigeons. They've always been a personal favourite.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_1.speaker: Tara the Tressym
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_1.text: Oh, but that reminds me! I've found you something. A lovely little keepsake. In the past it might've helped with your condition, but now that you're better, perhaps you can put it to some other use.
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera shows the ring and the letters at Tara's feet.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_44.speaker: Tara the Tressym
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_44.text: I know, I know, but I just love you so.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_75.speaker: Gale
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_75.text: Tara, I don't suppose you're responsible for the missing messenger pigeons...

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_67.speaker: Gale
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_67.text: Hang on - isn't this where the post house's courier pigeons roost? I don't suppose you've been eating them...

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_52.speaker: Tara the Tressym
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_52.text: One needn't guess. Pigeon meat is my second-favourite.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_45.speaker: Gale
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_45.text: No more pigeons, Tara. They have an important job to do.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_31.speaker: Tara the Tressym
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_31.text: Importance is relative. A letter may be important to one; a growling belly may be more important to another.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_48.speaker: Tara the Tressym
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_48.text: You aren't going to scold me, are you, sir?

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_39.speaker: Gale
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_39.text: No, but I am going to make you very sorry if you don't stop.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_41.speaker: Tara the Tressym
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_41.text: Well! These must be important birds indeed, Mr Dekarios. Forgive me for feasting on their bodies and bones so very voraciously.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_17.speaker: Tara the Tressym
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_17.text: I'll be on my way, then. There are a few places in the city I'd like to visit. I might've sussed some interesting items I'd rather like to get my paws upon. If I find anything interesting, I might even be willing to share.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_15.speaker: Tara the Tressym
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_15.text: Until then, all on the up and up with you, sir?

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_2.speaker: Gale
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_2.text: More or less. But the city is still in danger.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_35.speaker: Tara the Tressym
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_35.text: Hop to it, then, sir. Imminent peril is terrible for my digestion.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_46.speaker: Gale
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_46.text: Up to my eyeballs in drama, deceit, and subterfuge. Nothing unusual.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_9.speaker: Tara the Tressym
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_9.text: You love it, don't you, sir? Like a fish in water.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_68.speaker: Gale
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_68.text: We'll catch up later, Tara - there's no time now.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_6.speaker: Tara the Tressym
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_6.text: You're lucky I adore you, you mutton-head.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_50.speaker: Tara the Tressym
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_50.text: I'll see you soon, I'm sure, Mr Dekarios. Do take care of yourself, all right?

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_62.speaker: Tara the Tressym
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_62.text: Actually, Mr Dekarios, I think the sorry one will be you.
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_62.context: InternalNodeContext: TAra launches a magic missle/ fireball at Gale

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_64.speaker: Gale
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_64.text: I am. Stop that, Tara! You need to leave the pigeons be.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_49.speaker: Tara the Tressym
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_49.text: In actual fact, I'm going to eat them up even faster and more voraciously than I did before. How about that?
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_49.context: InternalNodeContext: TAra eats all the pigeons after this

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_19.speaker: Gale
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_19.text: There's a much better aviary across town, if you've already picked over the choice cuts here.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_40.speaker: Tara the Tressym
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_40.text: Another aviary, you say? Well, that does sound quite interesting. The brood here is getting a little thin.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_28.speaker: Tara the Tressym
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_28.text: Perhaps while I'm seeking out this new feasthall, I'll pay a few visits around town. I might've sussed some interesting items I'd rather like to get my paws upon.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_36.speaker: Tara the Tressym
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_36.text: If I find anything interesting, I might even be willing to share.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_4.speaker: Tara the Tressym
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_4.text: I haven't. In fact, I've got a great deal more to eat, indeed. And neither you nor anyone else is going to stop me, Mr Dekarios. Tara away!

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_56.speaker: Tara the Tressym
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_56.text: Thank you. I most certainly will, sir.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_22.speaker: Gale
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_22.text: Time to move along, Tara. If you get caught here, you'll be in trouble.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_51.speaker: Tara the Tressym
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_51.text: Anyone who tries to remove me will be in far worse trouble, I assure you.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_73.speaker: Gale
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_73.text: I'd offer you some of your favourite meat, but I haven't got any. Beholder jerky is surprisingly hard to come by.

Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_72.speaker: Tara the Tressym
Tara_OM_Gale_AOM_COM_OOM_72.text: More's the pity. But no bother. These pigeons are quite delicious.
